name: Kingdom of Gouldor: Text Adventure
description:
Kingdom of Gouldor: Text Adventure

Platform:  HTML/Browser Game

Genre: Text Adventure

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 15+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: 

Have you ever wanted to make the decisions of a king?  Well, now you can! With this interactive game, you can tell your own story with your own decisions! You can rule with an iron fist, or you can be the most generous king ever! The fate of the Kindom of Gouldor Rests in your hands!

Instructions: Make decisions by clicking on available colored text, and read through as the story unfolds

Dante Trejo – Game Designer
